item.title: One in three Manhattan condo owners lost money when they sold in the last year
item.description: Manhattan is still among the most expensive markets in the country, especially on a per-square-foot basis.

item.title: Manhattan's lost decade for condos: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the lost decade Manhattan's condo market.

item.title: As secondhand luxury soars, authentication becomes a new gold standard
item.description: Secondhand fashion and luxury is gaining ground fast, with the global resale market expected to hit up to $360 billion by 2030 from about $210 billion...

item.title: Tech billionaires' ramp up bets on AI, biotech
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Money Movers' with the latest investment trends in tech.

item.title: Billionaires bet on AI, biotech: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with a look at where some of America's wealthiest individuals are putting their money.
